mapper.insert: insert into spon(user_no, artist_no, spon_date, price, status, type, board_no, purchase_token, receipt_id, purchase_status, verify_status, platform, product_id, currency) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{artist_no}, #{spon_date}, #{price}, #{status}, #{type}, #{board_no}, #{purchase_token}, #{receipt_id}, #{purchase_status}, #{verify_status}, #{platform}, #{product_id}, #{currency})
mapper.select: select * from spon order by spon_date DESC
